Title: Establishes the New York entrepreneur program act
Summary: Establishes the New York entrepreneur program act authorizing SUNY to accept startup businesses into a loan deferral and repayment program.
LawCode: Add Art 5 Part 2-A §§286 - 286-c, Ed L; add §§44 & 187-t, amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the tax law, in relation to establishing the New York entrepreneur program act
